entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.

text: @realDonaldTrump Mr.Trump has been blaming China for coronavirus, as a result, USA is the number one virus affected area in the world; he is also blaming China for Hong Kong protests, and now protests are everywhere in the USA; he is blaming Huawei, and Huawei will be much stronger than before!
